title: Evaluating radon concentration and temporal correction factors in residential and workplace buildings: A comparison of passive and active methods
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Tiberius Dicu, Marius Botoş, Alexandra Cucoş, Şerban Grecu, Ştefan Florică, Arthur Tunyagi
